sentences.sContent: Her poems are modishly experimental in style and recondite in subject matter.
sentences.sCn: 她的诗在风格上时尚朦胧，在主题上深奥难懂。

synos.tran: 深奥的；隐藏的；默默无闻的

remMethod.val: re(反) + con(共同) + dit(说) + e → 不是对所有人都能说明白 → 深奥的

trans.tranCn: 深奥的, 隐藏的, 晦涩的
trans.tranOther: recondite facts or subjects are not known about or understood by many people
